lead_paragraph: Tom Crean, the Indiana men’s basketball coach, said he would not reinstate Armon Bassett and Jamarcus Ellis, who were ordered off the team in March by the interim coach Dan Dakich. He also said that DeAndre Thomas and Eli Holman would not return to the team. Holman told coaches Thursday that he intended to transfer.
